features: 【Incredible Superhero】This is the character in the movie. It can not only bring unlimited fun to children, but also stimulate their imagination and sense of justice.
【Impressive Action Figure】The clastic anime characters figure measures about 8 inch tall, the details on this toy and body show the meticulous workmanship of the product.
【High Quality Material】Made of non-toxic high-quality PVC raw material and meticulous workmanship, ensuring durability and an authentic look and feel.
【Christmas Gift】This movie action figure is the perfect gift for any hero movie fans. Its exquisite craftsmanship and authenticity make it an unforgettable gift to cherish for a lifetime.

【Occasions】Make your home decor more fun and personal by bringing your favorite movie fun hero into your home! Our anime action figure ornament can be used in movie theme party, cake decorating, devil slayer party supplies, or office, exhibition and so on. It can add some personality and fun, making your occasion more unique and memorable.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewText: My nephew is 3-year-old and he loves action figures. This is very sturdy and the pieces don't fall off so you don't have to worry about choking hazard. It's an action figure so I really doesn't do much it does as much as your imagination allows. Simple gift yet Priceless with a little one one.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Accessories do not stay on
reviews.reviewText: Helmet falls off but the part that is upsetting is his bottom armor/skirt does not stay on and falls apart revealing a naked hulk.

reviews.reviewerName: Pretty sure this was a used toy, came in a plastic bag with everything loose and the hulk himself looks like it was dragged across “Andy’s” drive way a few times by Woody and Buzz. Boo this person
reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Used Ass Toy
reviews.reviewText: selling used toys as new gets you a special spot in Hades playground

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 27, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This action figure reminds me of the old He-Man action figures that I played with in the 1980s. It has the same feel, weight, and texture as those. We ordered this for our 4 years old grandson and he loves it, he actually thinks it’s the Hulk from Marvel so I am just gonna go with it cause the toy does look very similar to the Hulk. It’s almost like it’s just the Hulk in disguise. It has a few little weapons and accessories to accompany.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Man this thing does make ME angry
reviews.reviewText: This green smash happy action figure arrives in the buff, so you'll need to wrestle his armor skirt and rugged manly shoulder pad on.All of the accessories are a rubbery mildly stretchy material, and the outfit has tiny flexible nubs that you have to push in to tiny flexible holes to keep them on. Some of these were easier to attach than others. I couldn't get the armor/skirt on securely.The helmet is a bit misshapen, it is also flexible material and one side kind of sticks out away from the figure's face.The openings in the right fist is too small to really get the hammer in to, again you will need to wrestle it in to get the figure to hold it even a little. It fell out shortly after the picture was taken, because I was only able to squish it into the hand a tiny bit. The handle for the hammer is thicker than the axe handle. The axe fits in either hand.I can position it in a way where it stands on its own without falling over at least.Some of the joints articulate better than others, the shoulders went more than I wanted while the elbows barely move.Overall I would have to give this a pass, you can buy Marvel branded figures for less than the list price on this that are better made.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 2, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Cool action figure for my son, he has liked playing with it. It seems to be well made and sturdy.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Heavy duty toy!
reviews.reviewText: This action figure is definitely a heavy duty and sturdy toy! He nearly feels indestructible and quality made. The clothing of the outfit along with accessories all have to be put on him, as he comes without a stitch. Some of the clothing was a tad bit tricky to get on, but once everything was on and assembled it definitely looks like a much more high end toy. While I think this is a great toy to play with and will bring lots of fun and quality- I'm not sure about how you would gift it, as it came in a see through plastic bag within an unmarked cardboard box. It honestly looked as though someone bought this took all the accessories off returned it in and threw into a bag to be re-sold. Otherwise it the item itself is great, just not sure about it being necessarily giftable.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars What a disappointment
reviews.reviewText: What a sizable disappointment this was. It's clearly the hulk, more specifically Gladiator Hulk from Planet Hulk, or MCU's Thor: Ragnarök. First thing about this figure is its big, bulky, and has some weight to it. The attachments aren't poorly made, but they don't really work either, like his outfit. It doesn't fit him well. Definitely not like the picture on Amazon. The weapons came bent and the figure was definitely used as it had stains and cuff marks like it had been scraped on the ground, and it was dirty and greasy upon opening.This was intended to be a present for a kid, but no.Not worth it.
